author: matz-e
body:
HCAL TP in 2017 have up to 4 fine-grain bits.  The
HcalTriggerPrimitiveSample already supports setting multiple fine-grain
bits, this adds support to the various compression classes.

In preparation for the 4 HE feature bits of 2017.
title: Change HCAL TP compression to account for multiple FG bits.
